name: A Lot Of Cameras
description:
In this Platformer, there are multiple cameras. Every camera shows different objects!

Good luck and have fun :)

                                                                                                                             

This game was made for:  https://itch.io/jam/quarantinejam

                                                                                                                             

Tools: Unity, Visual Studio

Art: https://itch.io/queue/c/463790/warped?game_id=157789
Art: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/pixel-font-tripfive-64734
